data.name: SearchNothingFoundMessage
data.value: There are no entries matching your search criteria.

data.name: StrExportHeader
data.value: BCUninstaller export Publisher | Version | Date | Size | Registry | Uninstaller type | Uninstall string | Quiet uninstall string | Comments

data.name: MessageBoxes_BackupFailedQuestion_Message
data.value: Registry backup failed, do you want to continue anyway?

data.name: MessageBoxes_Error_details
data.comment: Add space or newline afterwards and two newlines before

data.name: MessageBoxes_BackupRegistryQuestion_Message
data.value: Do you want to create a registry backup before continuing?

data.name: MessageBoxes_BackupRegistryQuestion_Details
data.value:
You will be able to roll back all changes by double-clicking it afterwards.
Files and directories will be moved to the recycle bin, you can restore them from there.

data.name: MessageBoxes_CanSelectOnlyOneItemInfo_Message
data.value: You need to select only one entry for this action

data.name: MessageBoxes_CanSelectOnlyOneItemInfo_Details
data.value: Select exactly one uninstaller from the list. If you are using check-boxes make sure to check them.

data.name: MessageBoxes_NoNetworkConnected_Message
data.value: Can't connect to the internet, there are no networks available.

data.name: MessageBoxes_NoNetworkConnected_Details
data.value: Make sure that your network cable is plugged in. If you are using Wi-Fi ensure that you have good signal strength.

data.name: MessageBoxes_AskToSubmitFeedback_Message
data.value: Would you like to send feedback concerning BCU?

data.name: MessageBoxes_AskToSubmitFeedback_Details
data.value:
This will take you less than a minute but help the development greatly! All feedback is appreciated, be it a bug report, feature request or a simple thanks!
You can send it later from the top menu bar (Help->Submit feedback).

data.name: MessageBoxes_UpdateUptodate_Message
data.value: Current version is up to date

data.name: MessageBoxes_UpdateUptodate_Details
data.value:
No updates were found at this time, you have the latest version.
Want some functionality added or a bug fixed? Please send me your feedback using "Help->Submit feedback" menu.

data.name: MessageBoxes_UpdateFailed_Message
data.value: Encountered an error while checking for updates

data.name: MessageBoxes_UpdateFailed_Details
data.value: Make sure that BCUninstaller is not blocked in your firewall and that you have a working internet connection.

data.name: MessageBoxes_UpdateAskToDownload_Message
data.value: New version {0} is available, do you want to upgrade now?
data.comment: 0 is version number

data.name: MessageBoxes_UpdateAskToDownload_Details
data.comment: 0 is a list of changes separated by "- "

data.name: MessageBoxes_UninstallMsiGuidMissing_Message
data.value: The selected entry can't be uninstalled using the MsiExec installer

data.name: MessageBoxes_UninstallMsiGuidMissing_Details
data.value: Selected uninstaller doesn't have a valid Guid for use with MsiExec.

data.name: MessageBoxes_TaskStopConfirmation_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to stop currently running task?

data.name: MessageBoxes_TaskStopConfirmation_Details
data.value: Stopping the task prematurely will not revert any changes. Currently running uninstaller won't be stopped, the task will wait for it to finish.

data.name: MessageBoxes_SysRestoreContinueAfterError_Message
data.value: Failed to create a new restore point

data.name: MessageBoxes_CanWalkAwayInfo_Message
data.value: You can now leave the computer

data.name: MessageBoxes_CanWalkAwayInfo_Details
data.value: Remaining uninstallers should be able to complete without any user intervention. You should still check in from time to time in case one of the uninstallers crashes.

data.name: MessageBoxes_ConfirmLowConfidenceQuestion_Message
data.value: Do you really want to modify low-confidence items?

data.name: MessageBoxes_ConfirmLowConfidenceQuestion_Details
data.value: Removing items marked with confidence lower than Good can be very dangerous! It is recommended that you verify that every single item is safe to delete.

data.name: MessageBoxes_DeleteRegKeysConfirmation_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove selected uninstaller entries?

data.name: MessageBoxes_DeleteRegKeysConfirmation_Details
data.value:
Following items will be removed from registry and will disappear from the uninstaller list, but will not be uninstalled.
{0}

data.name: MessageBoxes_ExportFailed_Message
data.value: An error has been encountered while saving exported data

data.name: MessageBoxes_ExportFailed_Details
data.value: If the error persists try saving to a different directory, for example to the desktop.

data.name: MessageBoxes_GetSystemRestoreDescription
data.comment: 0 is the uninstaller count

data.name: MessageBoxes_InvalidNewEntryName_Message
data.value: Supplied name is empty or contains invalid characters

data.name: MessageBoxes_InvalidNewEntryName_Details
data.value: Make sure you have not included any of the following characters: {0}
data.comment: 0 is list of characters separated by spaces

data.name: MessageBoxes_LookForJunkQuestion_Message
data.value: Do you want to look for leftovers from performed uninstallation(s)?

data.name: MessageBoxes_LookForJunkQuestion_Details
data.value: Please note that this feature is intended only for power users that understand how it works. It is not necessary to remove these files and they will not affect system performance in any meaningful way.

data.name: MessageBoxes_NoJunkFoundInfo_Details
data.value: No leftovers were found. There still might be some residue left so you can run a temporary file cleaner like CCleaner.

data.name: MessageBoxes_NothingToCopy_Message
data.value: There was nothing to copy to the clipboard. Either no selected uninstaller has this bit of information or you didn't select anything.

data.name: MessageBoxes_OpenDirectoriesMessageBox_OpenMultiple
data.value: This action will open {0} directories at once, are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: 0 is number of directories to open

data.name: MessageBoxes_SelfUninstallQuestion_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to uninstall BCUninstaller?

data.name: MessageBoxes_SelfUninstallQuestion_Details
data.value: I'm sorry to see you leave! If you have a minute or two please drop a word on why you uninstalled BCU on my website (http://klocmansoftware.weebly.com/). I'll do my best to fix any legitimate problems.

data.name: MessageBoxes_SysRestoreBeginQuestion_Message
data.value: Do you want to create a restore point before continuing?

data.name: MessageBoxes_SysRestoreBeginQuestion_Details
data.value: If you are unsure if applications you are uninstalling are important or required to system stability it is recommended to create a restore point. If anything breaks after the procedure you can then use System Restore to roll back the changes.

data.name: MessageBoxes_SearchOnlineError_Message
data.value: An error has been encountered while opening the search page

data.name: MessageBoxes_SaveUninstallListError_Message
data.value: Failed to save the list to a file

data.name: MessageBoxes_ResetSettingsConfirmation_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all application settings?

data.name: MessageBoxes_QuietUninstallersNotAvailableQuestion_Message
data.value: Some applications can't be uninstalled quietly

data.name: MessageBoxes_ProtectedItemsWarningQuestion_Message
data.value: Some entries are protected and can not be modified

data.name: MessageBoxes_ProtectedItemError_Message
data.value: Selected entry is protected and can not be modified

data.name: MessageBoxes_OpenUrlError_Message
data.value: An error has been encountered while opening the URL

data.name: MessageBoxes_OpenUninstallListQuestion_Message
data.value: Do you want to keep current selection?

data.name: MessageBoxes_OpenDirectoryError_Message
data.value: An error has been encountered while opening the directory

data.name: MessageBoxes_NoUninstallersSelectedInfo_Message
data.value: No uninstallers were selected, nothing to uninstall

data.name: MessageBoxes_NoUninstallersSelectedInfo_Details
data.value: To uninstall applications you must first select them from the list view. If you are using check-boxes, make sure that they are checked.

data.name: MessageBoxes_OpenUninstallListQuestion_Details
data.value: If you choose to keep current selection it will be merged with the opened list(s)

data.name: MessageBoxes_OpenUrlsMessageBox_OpenMultiple_Message
data.value: This action will open {0} URLs at once, are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: MessageBoxes_ProtectedItemsWarningQuestion_Details
data.comment: 0 names of protected uninstallers

data.name: MessageBoxes_ProtectedItemError_Details
data.value:
Protected entry: {0}
To modify this entry you need to disable uninstaller protection from the settings panel.
data.comment: 0 name of protected uninstaller

data.name: MessageBoxes_QuietUninstallersNotAvailableQuestion_Details
data.comment: 0 is names of non-quiet uninstallers

data.name: MessageBoxes_ResetSettingsConfirmation_Details
data.value: All of your settings will be lost permanently. BCUninstaller will have to restart to complete this action.

data.name: MessageBoxes_SysRestoreContinueAfterError_Details
data.value: The restore point WAS NOT CREATED, you will not be able to restore changes! Do you want to continue with the uninstallation anyway?

data.name: UninstallProgressWindow_TaskDone
data.comment: Shown on the status bar

data.name: UninstallProgressWindow_Uninstalling
data.comment: Shown on the status bar

data.name: PropertiesWindow_Table_ErrorMsi
data.value: Nothing to display. This application is uninstalled using Windows Installer (MsiExec).

data.name: MainWindow_Statusbar_StatusReady
data.comment: Shows up when nothing else is displayed on the status bar.

data.name: MainWindow_Statusbar_StatusSelection
data.comment: {0} is a number of selected uninstallers

data.name: MainWindow_Statusbar_Total
data.comment: {0} is a number of all uninstallers, {1} is a long file size (123 Megabytes)

data.name: MessageBoxes_ExternalCommandFailed_Message
data.comment: {0} is a command line (c:\example.exe /help)

data.name: DefaultLanguage
data.comment: Used in language select box when you want to use the system language

data.name: MessageBoxes_RestartNeededForSettingChangeQuestion_Details
data.value: Some settings will not take effect until the application is restarted.

data.name: MessageBoxes_RestartNeededForSettingChangeQuestion_Message
data.value: Do you want to restart BCU to apply new settings?

data.name: MainWindow_Statusbar_ProcessingUninstallers
data.comment: {0} is how many items were processed, {1} is their total number

data.name: MessageBoxes_TaskSkip_Details
data.value:
Selecting "Terminate" will immediately close the running uninstaller and might result in uninstallation not being completed. Usually it is possible to run the uninstaller again to finish the uninstallation.
Alternatively you can skip waiting for this process. Skipping will let the uninstaller continue working while the task moves on to the next item. Keep in mind that some uninstallers can fail to run until the skipped process finishes.

data.name: MessageBoxes_TaskSkip_Message
data.value: Do you want to skip waiting for the currently running uninstaller?

data.name: MessageBoxes_UninstallAlreadyRunning_Message
data.value: Another uninstall task is already running. Please wait for it to finish and then try again.

data.name: JunkRemove_Details_Message
data.comment: {0} - Rating as a string {1} - List of strings of positive parts of the rating {2} - List of strings of negative parts of the rating The lists are separated by a single newline.

data.name: PropertiesWindow_Table_ErrorMissingRegistry
data.value: This application does not have a valid registry entry

data.name: PropertiesWindow_Table_ErrorMissingUninstaller
data.value: This application does not have a valid uninstaller

data.name: MainWindow_Statusbar_RefreshingStartup
data.comment: Shown when refreshing autostart information of the uninstallers

data.name: NotAvailable
data.comment: Used on application list when value is not available

data.name: MessageBoxes_RatingsDisabled_Message
data.value: You have to enable ratings from the settings first.

data.name: MessageBoxes_RatingUnavailable_Message
data.value: You can't rate applications that are not installed properly.

data.name: RateTitle_Counted
data.comment: {0} is number of apps to rate, "Rate " will be automatically put in front of this string

data.name: MessageBoxes_ForceRunUninstallFailedError_Message
MessageBoxes_ForceRunUninstallFailedError_Header
data.value: Failed to run some of the uninstallers

data.name: MessageBoxes_Net4Missing_Message
data.value: .NET Framework v4.0 was not found, some features will be disabled

data.name: MessageBoxes_Net4Missing_Details
data.value: The v4.0 framework is optional, but recommended. The features that rely on the framework will be disabled until you install it.

data.name: MessageBoxes_AskToRetryFailedQuietAsLoud_Header
data.value: Do you want to try running quiet uninstallers that failed as loud?

data.name: MessageBoxes_AskToRetryFailedQuietAsLoud_Details
data.value: Following uninstallers will be restarted loudly:

data.name: UninstallFromDirectory_FolderBrowse
data.value: Select directory with applications that you want to remove.

data.name: MessageBoxes_UninstallFromDirectoryNothingFound_Message
data.value: No applications were found in the specified directory

data.name: MessageBoxes_UninstallFromDirectoryNothingFound_Details
data.value: Make sure that you selected the correct directory and that the application's executables are still present.

data.name: MessageBoxes_UninstallFromDirectoryUninstallerFound_Details
data.value: Do you want to run this uninstaller?

data.name: NukeWindow_NoFilesSelected_Message
data.value: No valid files or directories were selected. Make sure you have access to them, and they aren't marked as system files.

data.name: Uninstaller_GetApplicationsFromDirectories_NothingFound_Message
data.value: Failed to find any applications inside {0}

data.name: MessageBoxes_ModifyCommandMissing_Details
data.value: The selected application has no modify command specified. It might be necessary to uninstall, and then install it again to change install settings.

data.name: MessageBoxes_AskToSaveUninstallList_Message
data.value: Save changes to the opened uninstall list?

data.name: MessageBoxes_AskToSaveUninstallList_Details
data.value: There are unsaved changes in the opened uninstall list that will be lost by closing it.

data.name: FileTargeter_SelectDirectoryWithAppsToRemove
data.value: Select the directory with the applications to uninstall.

data.name: JunkRemoveWindow_SelectBackupDirectoryTitle
data.value: Select where to save the backup. A new directory will be created.
